There is a reason why this place has so many positive reviews.  It's worth it.  It busy all day long and it moves at a good pace.  We had the Eggs Benedict and Turkey Waffle.  The taste was delicious.  The service was even better.  We were in Barcelona for one week.  We had great food through out the city.  This was just amazing.  If you are near the Ramblas area you must try.
